name: Dexterity
description: Speed and ease of movement, covering both full body movement (i.e. gymnastics) and hand-eye coordination

name: Endurance
description: Physical hardiness, including resistance to disease and physical trauma and how fast you can recover

name: Charisma
description: How you come across to others socially; how you conduct yourself in public when not actively interacting with others

name: Manipulation
description: How easily you bend others to your will, either through persuasion or threats

name: Appearance
description: Your level of attractiveness; may be raised temporarily with clothing or other adornment

name: Perception
description: Your ability to notice things, to perceive the world around you, through all your senses

name: Wits
description: Quickness of thinking; measures how easily you make leaps of logic or intuition
